articles.author: Luke Bowden
articles.title: Fans of Shane Warne share their memories of the cricket great at his MCG memorial
articles.description: Athletes don't come much more famous than Shane Warne, but he still had an innate connection to everyday Australians, even if their introduction to him came via an episode of Kath and Kim.
articles.content:
The last time I saw Shane Warne was the second day of the day-night Ashes Test in Hobart, in early January.
It was a couple of overs before the end of the first session of play and he had made his w… [+6149 chars]

articles.description:

articles.content: Imran Khan 'has to resign' as prime minister of Pakistan, Bilawal Bhutto Zardari, chairman of the opposition Pakistan Peoples Party, said Wednesday amid growing speculation Khan, a former World Cup-w… [+3253 chars]

articles.author: ABC News
articles.title: Shane Warne's family shares emotive tributes at state memorial honouring the late cricket great
articles.description: In a service filled with tributes from international celebrities and sporting greats, the words of cricketing star Shane Warne's children struck the deepest chord.
articles.content:
The last time Summer Warne saw her dad Shane, Bryan Adams' Summer of '69 was blaring out of his car.
"You were coming to pick up your bag you needed for Thailand," she said.
"[You] had your car doo… [+4884 chars]

articles.title: As it happened Shane Warne memorial: Allan Border, Sir Elton John and Chris Martin among tributes to cricket legend
articles.description: Follow along for all the big moments as Australia remembers cricket legend Shane Warne’s state memorial service at the MCG.
articles.content:
Brooke Warne has described the similarities between herself and her father.
My dad taught me resilience and strength in so many ways, to always stand up for ourselves and what we believe in, to alwa… [+1031 chars]
